## chromatic number
* graphclasses.org: [chromatic number](https://www.graphclasses.org/classes/par_19.html)
* [â†—](https://mathworld.wolfram.com/ChromaticNumber.html) The chromatic number of a graph G is the smallest number of colors needed to color the vertices of G so that no two adjacent vertices share the same color (Skiena 1990, p. 210), ...
